title: [Medicine] Human SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody COR-101 demonstrates high efficacy in a COVID-19 animal model and is ready to be used in clinical studies to treat COVID-19 patients

[Psychology] Concerns over infecting others play a greater role in people's willingness to be vaccinated in sparsely populated areas than dense urban ones. Researchers examined people's behavior getting a flu vaccine as well as their future intentions to be vaccinated against the flu and COVID-19.
